Description.Text: Situated on a quiet street in the heart of the old city, within walking distance of the St Sophia Museum and the Blue Mosque, the Samir Hotel is an ideal starting point for those who wish to explore Istanbul. Promising efficient services and comfortable accommodation, the hotel allows guests to avoid the hustle and bustle while still being close to numerous historical attractions and cultural treasures, thanks to an array of convenient public transport links in the vicinity. Authentic regional delicacies complimented by refreshing beverages are served in the onsite restaurant, while immaculate cocktails and tasty snacks can be enjoyed by friends and family in the bar. Commanding superb city views, the open-top rooftop bar is a great place to relax all throughout the day.
